description.value:
Trigger You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained] by a creature.

You counter the creature with the power of elemental water, a tendril of it encasing your limb or weapon. You attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple] the triggering creature, even if it's outside your reach or you don't have a free hand. If you succeed, you also remove the triggering condition, and the tendril of water pulls the creature adjacent to you before dissipating.
